outputs.output_descr:
1. Rehabilitation of livelihoods among individuals and communities affected by the tsunami.
2. Improved disaster risk management and climate change adaptation at community level.
3. Strengthening early recovery coordination and capacity building through partnership.
4. Strengthening local governance systems of early recovery interventions.
